var.v: -webkit-touch-callout: none;-webkit-user-select: none;-khtml-user-select: none;-moz-user-select: none;-ms-user-select: none;user-select: none;

risc.v: url(eclntjsfserver/images/deco_mandatory_risc.png) no-repeat right top, linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(0,0,255,0.35) 0%,rgba(0,0,255,0.0) 5px) no-repeat
url(eclntjsfserver/images/deco_error_risc.png) no-repeat right top, linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(255,0,0,0.35) 0%,rgba(255,0,0,0.0) 5px) no-repeat
url(eclntjsfserver/images/deco_mandatory_risc_withdistance.png) no-repeat right top, linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(0,0,255,0.35) 0%,rgba(0,0,255,0.0) 5px) no-repeat
url(eclntjsfserver/images/deco_error_risc_withdistance.png) no-repeat right top, linear-gradient(to bottom, rgba(255,0,0,0.35) 0%,rgba(255,0,0,0.0) 5px) no-repeat
